properties.name: app.jwt.secret
properties.description: Secret key used to sign issued JWT tokens.

properties.name: app.jwt.expiration-ms
properties.description: JWT expiration window expressed in milliseconds.

properties.name: app.cors.allowed-origins
properties.description: Comma-separated list of origins that are allowed to call the API.

properties.name: allowed.origins
properties.description: Legacy configuration for repository CORS that lists allowed origins.
